nodes.documentation:
@notice  Basic interface containing some useful functions for RAY integration.

/// Author:   Devan Purhar
nodes.name: IRAYStorage

nodes.documentation: @notice  Get the portfolioId associated with a RAY token
nodes.name: getTokenKey

nodes.documentation:
@notice  Get the contract address of the underlying asset associated with a
          portfolioId
nodes.name: getPrincipalAddress

nodes.documentation: @notice  Get if a contract address follows the ERC20 standard or not
nodes.name: getIsERC20
getContractAddress

nodes.documentation: @notice  Get the shares owned by a RAY token
nodes.name: getTokenShares

nodes.documentation: @notice  Get the capital credited to a RAY token
nodes.name: getTokenCapital

nodes.documentation:
@notice  Get the allowance credited to a RAY token - allowance decides what
          amount of value will be charged a fee
nodes.name: getTokenAllowance

nodes.documentation:
@notice  Basic interface containing some useful functions for RAY integration.

/// Author:   Devan Purhar
nodes.name: IRAYStorage

nodes.documentation: @notice  Get the portfolioId associated with a RAY token
nodes.name: getTokenKey

nodes.documentation:
@notice  Get the contract address of the underlying asset associated with a
          portfolioId
nodes.name: getPrincipalAddress

nodes.documentation: @notice  Get if a contract address follows the ERC20 standard or not
nodes.name: getIsERC20
getContractAddress

nodes.documentation: @notice  Get the shares owned by a RAY token
nodes.name: getTokenShares

nodes.documentation: @notice  Get the capital credited to a RAY token
nodes.name: getTokenCapital

nodes.documentation:
@notice  Get the allowance credited to a RAY token - allowance decides what
          amount of value will be charged a fee
nodes.name: getTokenAllowance

params.contractId: - Each contract has an id represented by the result of                       a keccak256() of the contract name.   ///                       Example: PortfolioManager.sol can be dynamically referenced                       by getContractAddress(keccak256('PortfolioManagerContract'));

getContractAddress(bytes32).notice: Dynamically get the contract address of different RAY smart contracts

getIsERC20(address).notice: Get if a contract address follows the ERC20 standard or not

getPrincipalAddress(bytes32).notice: Get the contract address of the underlying asset associated with a          portfolioId

getTokenAllowance(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Get the allowance credited to a RAY token - allowance decides what          amount of value will be charged a fee

getTokenCapital(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Get the capital credited to a RAY token

getTokenKey(bytes32).notice: Get the portfolioId associated with a RAY token

getTokenShares(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Get the shares owned by a RAY token

userdoc.notice: Basic interface containing some useful functions for RAY integration.  /// Author:   Devan Purhar
